Web Design

New logo for Lemon Peel Facial

We enjoyed working with Houston-based esthetician Michelle Wright

2 April 2015

We recently designed a new custom logo for Michelle Wright of Lemon Peel Facial.

It was inspired by the old version, having a similar layout. The lemon has been updated though to provide a more sophisticated look. You can see it on her site, www.LemonPeelFacial.com. Below is a comparison of the new and original logo.

Site Link | www.LemonPeelFacial.com
